statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE progress < 0.3;
SELECT student_name, learning_resource FROM students ORDER BY progress ASC;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE progress < 0.3 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE progress BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_name, learning_resource FROM students WHERE LENGTH(learning_resource) > 100 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students, AVG(progress) AS average_progress FROM students WHERE progress IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT name, progress FROM students ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT resource_name, level_required FROM learning_resources WHERE level_required BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT id, name, progress FROM students JOIN learning_resources ON progress >= level_required;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT name, progress FROM students ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT name, progress FROM students WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT s.name, lr.resource_name FROM students s JOIN learning_resources lr ON s.progress >= lr.level_required;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, lr.resource_name AS required_resource FROM students s JOIN learning_resources lr ON s.progress < lr.level_required;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT * FROM LearningResources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, resource_id, progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY student_id ASC, progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT name, progress FROM Students ORDER BY progress DESC;

SELECT Students.name, LearningResources.resource_name FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id JOIN LearningResources ON StudentProgress.resource_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT Students.name, SUM(progress) AS total_progress FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id GROUP BY Students.name;
SELECT * FROM LearningResources WHERE resource_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students ORDER BY progress DESC;

SELECT student_name, resource_name, resource_type FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id JOIN LearningResources ON StudentProgress.resource_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT student_id, resource_name, access_timestamp FROM AccessLogs JOIN LearningResources ON AccessLogs.resource_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT resource_name, difficulty_level FROM LearningResources WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, resource_name, progress FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id INNER JOIN LearningResources ON StudentProgress.resource_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, difficulty_level FROM LearningResources WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT student_name, access_timestamp FROM Students INNER JOIN AccessLogs ON Students.student_id = AccessLogs.student_id WHERE access_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM Students WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT student_name, resource_name FROM Students INNER JOIN LearningResources ON Students.student_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM Students ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT student_name, resource_name, level_required FROM Students LEFT JOIN LearningResources ON Students.student_id = LearningResources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, progress_percentage FROM Students WHERE progress_percentage > 75;

SELECT Students.student_name, LearningResources.resource_name FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id INNER JOIN LearningResources ON StudentProgress.resource_id = LearningResources.resource_id;

SELECT Students.student_name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM Students INNER JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING total_score > 100;

SELECT Students.student_name, ProgressHistory.progress_date, ProgressHistory.progress_percentage FROM Students LEFT JOIN ProgressHistory ON Students.student_id = ProgressHistory.student_id ORDER BY ProgressHistory.progress_percentage DESC, ProgressHistory.progress_date ASC;
